## ui package

Provides utils for the User Interface

## Functions

| Function                                                                        | Description                                                                                                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [createEditorUiTheme(key, createDefaultTheme)](./ui.createeditoruitheme.md)     | Creates a function that maps [EditorThemeProps](./ui.editorthemeprops.md) to the current theme of the specified editor UI component       |
| [createIcon(i)](./ui.createicon.md)                                             | Creates an icon component                                                                                                                 |
| [createRendererUiTheme(key, createDefaultTheme)](./ui.createrendereruitheme.md) | Creates a function that maps [RendererThemeProps](./ui.rendererthemeprops.md) to the current theme of the specified renderer UI component |
| [EdtrIcon(props)](./ui.edtricon.md)                                             | Edtr.io icon component                                                                                                                    |
| [Icon(props)](./ui.icon.md)                                                     | Font Awesome Icon component                                                                                                               |
| [RootThemeProvider(props)](./ui.rootthemeprovider.md)                           | Provider to hydrate the context for the [Theme](./ui.theme.md)                                                                            |
| [ThemeProvider(props)](./ui.themeprovider.md)                                   | Provider to override the current [theme](./ui.theme.md)                                                                                   |
| [useEditorTheme()](./ui.useeditortheme.md)                                      | React Hook for the editor theming                                                                                                         |
| [useEditorUiTheme(key, createDefaultTheme)](./ui.useeditoruitheme.md)           | React Hook for the theme of an editor UI component                                                                                        |
| [useRendererTheme()](./ui.userenderertheme.md)                                  | React Hook for the renderer theming                                                                                                       |
| [useRendererUiTheme(key, createDefaultTheme)](./ui.userendereruitheme.md)       | React Hook for the theme of a renderer UI component                                                                                       |
| [useTheme()](./ui.usetheme.md)                                                  | React Hook to get the current [Theme](./ui.theme.md)                                                                                      |
